interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: ikoo E-Styler Pro Heated Hair Styling Brush for Women, Thermal & Ceramic, Straightens & Creates Waves, Rotating Power Cable, Auto-Off, One-Touch-Navigation for Easy Heat Control - Beluga Black Review Date: 2021/07/26 Store: ikoo Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Ikoo', 'Color': 'Black', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Special Feature': 'Auto-off', 'Product Dimensions': '13.03 x 4.53 x 3.35 inches; 2.01 Pounds'} Review Text: I have tried quite a lot of electric styling brushes over the last few years, and I have to say that this is definitely the best designed and overall best one I have used. The design of it with the grooves on the sides makes it so that your hair doesn’t tangle or wave awkwardly. It fells solid and seams to be good quality overall.

This IMO E-styler isn’t going to give you stick straight hair like a straightener would, but it does work very well for giving you a more natural looking straightness without making your hair look thin, unlike a traditional straightener.

On the flip side, it is not going to give you tighter curls, it’s more for waves and again more natural looking waves. But it does do waves very well.

It’s definitely unique and I have never seen one quite like this. But that’s not a bad thing! As long as your aware of what it can and can’t do and the types of styles it can produce, then you will be happy with it! Overall it’s pricy, but I like it a lot! Review Title: Very unique and excels at natural looking straightening and waves Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
TINY BUDDHA Mindfulness Gift Set Includes Soothing Bath and Shower Gel, Relaxing Pillow Spray, Calming Essential Oil Roll-On, Lychee Flower Scented Candle and Daily Mindfulness Practice Guide Tiny Buddha {'Brand': 'Tiny Buddha', 'Special Feature': 'Scented', 'Seasons': 'All Seasons', 'Item Volume': '1 Fluid Ounces', 'Unit Count': '12.00 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '8.35 x 8.07 x 2.52 inches; 1.45 Pounds', 'Manufacturer': 'KMI Brands'} While I really like this Tiny Buddha Mindfullness set, mine came completely soaked, so much that the box was falling apart. The culprit was the pillow spray that had leaked almost completely out since the lid wasn’t on securely. Which is a shame because I absolutely love pillow sprays and use them every single night, and this one smelled really good.

That being said the rest of the set was just ok for me. The candle does smell good, but it is super tiny and only burned for a few hours before it was gone. The shower gel smells amazing, but didn’t lather as well as I hoped and the scent didn’t linger. And the essential oil roll on was alright, though it smelled kind of musty or something. I would have given this 4 stars if the pillow spray wasn’t leaked everywhere, but it was, so only 3 stars. Pillow spray leaked everywhere, but it smelled really good MINETAN BODY.SKIN Tan Booster Foam - Boosts Color Results for Deeper, Darker, Longer Lasting Results, 10.14 fl oz {'Brand': 'MINETAN BODY.SKIN', 'Product Benefits': 'Suits all skin types & tones for those wanting to boost the results from their self tan with illuminating results.Suits all skin types & tones for those wanting to boost the results from their self tan with illuminating results. See more', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Material Feature': 'Certified Organic', 'Item Weight': '0.36 Kilograms', 'Product Dimensions': '21.26 x 21.26 x 87.4 inches; 12.7 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'MIH201905'} I have been using Minetan products for a few years now almost exclusively, so it goes without saying that I love most of there products! This Minetan tan booster mousse has a light foamy texture and goes on clear. It definitely helps your sunless tanner last longer and is decently moisturizing.

Honestly I do like this mousse, but I personally prefer Minetan tan extending lotion to this mousse. The mousse seams to me to have a little bit of stiffness and stickiness when I put it on my skin. I do still like the mousse, but I would take there lotion over this if given the choice. But still a good product! I think it’s more personal preference as I prefer the brands lotion tanning products to there mousse ones. Great product! Oreola Fish Line Hair Extensions Real Human Hair Natural Black Wire Hair Extensions Straight Hairpiece for Women #1B 20inch 120G Oreola {'Brand': 'Oreola', 'Color': '#1B Natural Black', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '20 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Package Dimensions': '7.87 x 3.94 x 1.97 inches; 8 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Oreola'} The hair itself is actually gorgeous on this Oreola Halo hair extensions. It’s very high quality and the color is not one monotone color, but instead multiple colors and is blended together beautifully. I have a bit of experience with these types of wigs and I find them the easiest for me for quick application. Once you get the hang of putting these on you can do it pretty quick, just watch lots of tutorials on utube and you will be a pro in no time!

The only critique I have is that I wish the hair were just a bit thicker. It’s gorgeous hair and it’s nice and long and easy to work with, but it’s just not very thick. Which kind of limits who can use it. If you have short hair that’s above chin length then this will not work for you. But overall it’s still great quality and I’m happy with it! Beautiful hair and well made ikoo E-Styler Pro Heated Hair Styling Brush for Women, Thermal & Ceramic, Straightens & Creates Waves, Rotating Power Cable, Auto-Off, One-Touch-Navigation for Easy Heat Control - Beluga Black ikoo {'Brand': 'Ikoo', 'Color': 'Black', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Special Feature': 'Auto-off', 'Product Dimensions': '13.03 x 4.53 x 3.35 inches; 2.01 Pounds'} I have tried quite a lot of electric styling brushes over the last few years, and I have to say that this is definitely the best designed and overall best one I have used. The design of it with the grooves on the sides makes it so that your hair doesn’t tangle or wave awkwardly. It fells solid and seams to be good quality overall.

This IMO E-styler isn’t going to give you stick straight hair like a straightener would, but it does work very well for giving you a more natural looking straightness without making your hair look thin, unlike a traditional straightener.

On the flip side, it is not going to give you tighter curls, it’s more for waves and again more natural looking waves. But it does do waves very well.

It’s definitely unique and I have never seen one quite like this. But that’s not a bad thing! As long as your aware of what it can and can’t do and the types of styles it can produce, then you will be happy with it! Overall it’s pricy, but I like it a lot! Very unique and excels at natural looking straightening and waves
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Mindfulness Focus:** The user continues to show a strong interest in mindfulness and relaxation products, particularly those with diverse aromatic elements, enhancing their overall well-being.

- **Aromatherapy Preference:** Maintains a nightly routine of using pillow sprays to promote calmness, underscoring the importance of quality in sleep-enhancing products.

- **Quality Expectations:** Expects high product standards, expressing disappointment in durability and effectiveness issues related to packaging and scent longevity. 

- **Scent Sensitivity:** Sensitive to musty or unpleasant fragrances, which greatly affects product satisfaction.

- **Mixed Product Experiences:** Retains a balanced view on efficacy, critically addressing practical concerns such as product size and effectiveness, including candle burn time.

- **Moderate Satisfaction Rating:** This critical evaluation informs lower satisfaction ratings, emphasizing the need for consistent quality across all components.

- **Tanning Product Enthusiasm:** Recently expressed enjoyment of moisturizing tanning products, favoring comfort in skincare textures.

- **Hair Extensions Interest:** Values high-quality hair extensions, demonstrating discernment regarding thickness and application ease, and is willing to address practical challenges for satisfactory results.

- **Styling Tool Appreciation:** Recently purchased a heated styling brush, highlighting an interest in innovative design and functionality that facilitates natural-looking hairstyles. The user appreciates products that balance uniqueness and practicality, valuing quality in their beauty tools while maintaining awareness of their limitations and capabilities.
